data.title: Mockingbird
data.title_text:
This is a podcast app, it's may porpuse is to show that is possible to write great apps using web technologies. Fell free to use at your own will!
In case you are interest, the full source code of this app is on github, check out.

You still don't have any podcasts registered... please click on the "New Podcast" button bellow or on the floating red button with a plus inside it!
data.add_podcast_page_content: Para procurar por um novo podcast na nossa base digite um nome ou a url (caso souber).
data.no_podcast_found: Sua busca não retornou nenhum podcast... por favor, reveja o que digitou e tente novamente.
